title: Herbalife font id
content:
hey,   
   
just wondering if someone can id this font for me.   
   
 [http://www.herbalife.com/IntroImages/Herbalife.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108102554/http:/www.herbalife.com/IntroImages/Herbalife.gif)   
   
thanks   
iota.
author: iota

comments.content:
Linotype Friz Quadrata with horizontal resize claustrophobic + Custom R?   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108102554im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/12414.gif)
Or maybe it could be [Dragon EF](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108102554/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/dragon/ef-medium/testdrive.html?s=HERBALIFE&p=48) with a few modifications...

The more I look at it the more it seems different from the original logo...   
B is different and so are the serifs on E and F.   
   
:-(
The A looks very Benguiat-ish, but the other letters are not quite benguiat

Friz Quadrata is probably the closest, although its not exactly the same, maybe theres a version from a different foundry thats the same, or maybe its another typeface altogether.   
   
thanks for your help guys.

there is always this if you want the logo in eps...   
   
 [http://www.logo.nino.ru/main/?text=herbalife&id=135](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108102554/http:/www.logo.nino.ru/main/?text=herbalife&id=135)
